scenes.title: Early Morning Alarm
scenes.description: Rosa's alarm clock goes off in the early morning darkness. She quickly silences it to avoid waking her husband Miguel, who sleeps beside her. A small statue of the Virgin Mary sits on her dresser. She crosses herself briefly before getting up.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, 1girl, middle-aged Hispanic woman, black hair with gray, sleepy, reaching for alarm clock, lying in bed, husband sleeping beside, dark bedroom, Virgin Mary statue on dresser visible, early morning, detailed interior, high quality
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, multiple women, bright room, alone in bed

scenes.title: Putting on Nursing Scrubs
scenes.description: Rosa puts on her nursing scrubs - teal-colored top and pants. She dresses quietly, her sleeping husband still in bed. The scrubs have pockets for pens and her badge. She clips her hospital ID to her top.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, 1girl, middle-aged Hispanic woman, black hair with gray in bun, putting on teal nursing scrubs, bedroom, husband sleeping in bed, hospital ID badge, getting ready for work, detailed interior, high quality
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, bright room, casual clothes, no scrubs

scenes.title: Kissing Husband Goodbye
scenes.description: Rosa quietly returns to the bedroom and kisses her still-sleeping husband Miguel on the forehead. She whispers 'te amo' before leaving. The small crucifix above the bed is visible.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, 1girl, middle-aged Hispanic woman, teal scrubs, kissing sleeping husband's forehead, bedroom, crucifix above bed visible, tender goodbye, early morning, detailed interior, high quality
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, husband awake, no crucifix, bright room

scenes.title: Changing Out of Scrubs After Work
scenes.description: Rosa changes out of her scrubs into comfortable home clothes - soft pants and a loose top. She puts her scrubs in the laundry hamper. The relief of changing after a long shift is visible.
scenes.character_state: tired, relieved, transitioning to home mode
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, 1girl, middle-aged Hispanic woman, black hair with gray, changing into comfortable clothes, bedroom, teal scrubs going into laundry hamper, relieved expression, evening after work, detailed interior, high quality
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, wearing scrubs, morning scene, not tired

scenes.title: Nighttime Prayer
scenes.description: Rosa kneels beside her bed for nighttime prayers. A small crucifix hangs on the wall. She prays for her patients, her family, and gives thanks. This nightly ritual brings her peace.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, 1girl, middle-aged Hispanic woman, black hair with gray, kneeling in prayer beside bed, crucifix on wall, peaceful expression, nighttime prayer ritual, bedroom, soft lamp light, detailed interior, high quality
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, standing, no crucifix, bright light, not praying

scenes.title: Morning Face Wash
scenes.description: Rosa enters the bathroom and turns on the light. The bathroom is practical and clean, with a single vanity and shower. She splashes water on her face at the sink, looking at herself in the mirror.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, 1girl, middle-aged Hispanic woman, black hair with gray, washing face at sink, bathroom, early morning, mirror, practical clean bathroom, vanity light on, detailed interior, high quality
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, multiple people, dressed for work, luxury bathroom

scenes.title: Putting Hair in Work Bun
scenes.description: Rosa brushes her black-and-gray hair, then ties it back in a practical bun secured with bobby pins. This hairstyle keeps her hair out of her face during her nursing shift. She looks professional and neat.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, 1girl, middle-aged Hispanic woman, black hair with gray streaks, putting hair in professional bun, bathroom mirror, bobby pins, nurse work preparation, detailed interior, high quality

scenes.title: Brushing Teeth
scenes.description: Rosa brushes her teeth with a regular toothbrush. She's thorough but efficient, checking the time on her watch. Mouthwash and dental floss sit by the sink. She rinses and spits.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, 1girl, middle-aged Hispanic woman, black hair with gray in bun, brushing teeth, bathroom sink, checking watch, mouthwash visible, morning routine, detailed interior, high quality

scenes.title: Helping Granddaughter with Bath
scenes.description: Rosa helps give her granddaughter Sofia a bath. The little girl plays with bath toys while Rosa pours water over her hair. Bubble bath suds fill the tub. Rosa smiles at Sofia's laughter.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, 1girl, middle-aged Hispanic woman, black hair with gray, casual clothes, helping small girl in bathtub, bath toys, bubble bath, grandmother caring for grandchild, bathroom, detailed interior, high quality

scenes.title: Evening Teeth Brushing
scenes.description: Rosa does her brief nighttime routine - brushing teeth and washing her face. She looks tired but content in the mirror. Her husband is already in bed waiting.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, 1girl, middle-aged Hispanic woman, black hair with gray loose, brushing teeth at bathroom mirror, tired but content expression, nighttime routine, soft light, detailed interior, high quality

scenes.title: Making Morning Coffee
scenes.description: Rosa starts the coffee maker in the kitchen, preparing cafe de olla (Mexican coffee with cinnamon). The kitchen is the heart of the home, with Mexican tiles as backsplash and religious calendar on the wall.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, 1girl, middle-aged Hispanic woman, teal scrubs, making coffee in kitchen, coffee maker, Mexican tile backsplash, religious calendar on wall, early morning, overhead light, detailed interior, high quality

scenes.title: Quick Breakfast Before Work
scenes.description: Rosa makes a quick breakfast - toasting a piece of bread and eating a banana. She doesn't have much time before her shift. Her lunch bag is on the counter, already packed from the night before.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, 1girl, middle-aged Hispanic woman, teal scrubs, eating quick breakfast standing in kitchen, toast, banana, coffee cup, packed lunch bag on counter, morning rush, detailed interior, high quality

scenes.title: Making Family Breakfast (Day Off)
scenes.description: Rosa makes a big family breakfast on her day off - huevos rancheros with homemade tortillas, beans, and fresh salsa. The kitchen smells wonderful. Her granddaughter watches excitedly.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, 1girl, middle-aged Hispanic woman, black hair with gray, casual clothes, cooking breakfast in kitchen, huevos rancheros, homemade tortillas on griddle, small girl watching, family kitchen, Mexican American home, detailed interior, high quality

scenes.title: Late Dinner After Shift
scenes.description: Rosa finally sits down to eat dinner with her family. Carmen has kept a plate warm for her. The table has traditional Mexican dishes - enchiladas, rice, beans. The family talks about their days.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, 1girl, middle-aged Hispanic woman, black hair with gray, comfortable clothes, eating dinner with family at dining table, Mexican food, enchiladas rice beans, family members present, warm family dinner, detailed interior, high quality

scenes.title: Washing Dishes with Daughter
scenes.description: Rosa and her daughter Carmen wash dishes together. Carmen washes while Rosa dries. They chat about Carmen's day. The kitchen shows signs of a loving home - family photos on fridge.

generation_settings.model: Animagine XL 3.1 or equivalent anime SDXL model

notes.scene_selection_rationale: Selected 5 scenes per location covering work day and day off scenarios. Emphasizes multigenerational family dynamics, nursing profession, Mexican American culture, and Catholic faith. Shows both work preparation and family caregiving roles.
notes.vocabulary_focus: POC scenes cover approximately 55 vocabulary items across bedroom, bathroom, and kitchen locations. Focus on nursing work, religious items, traditional Mexican American cooking, and family relationships.
notes.character_consistency: All scenes should maintain Rosa's core appearance: black hair with gray streaks, tan/olive skin, warm brown eyes, average curvy build. Hair in bun for work scenes, loose at home. Teal scrubs for work, comfortable clothes at home.
